import React, {Component} from 'react' import {login} from '../index.js' export class LoginPage extends Component { state = { visibility: "hidden", access: "login" } switchAccess(){ if (this.state.visibility === "hidden") this.setState({visibility:"visible", access:"signup"}) else this.setState({visibility:"hidden", access:"login"}) } render(){ return ( <>
